channel.title: Episode 16: Meat and Attitude
channel.description:
[http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-16-meat-and-attitude/][1]
Ian and Andrey discuss Andrey’s new mobile apps, doing press releases in unique cases, HARO, bringing on a partner, Valentino movie, Breaking Bad, Andrey on being abducted, dress code in fancy steak joints, optimal steak restaurant design, Snappy marketing, doing a giveaway
[1]: http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-16-meat-and-attitude/
